wordGroup: year-end bonus 年终奖金，年终额外补贴

sentences.en: The workers expected to share out a year-end bonus.
Surviving the year-end cash crunch is always tough.
sentences.cn: 在年终剩余现金往往是困难的。

sentences.en: The company also revised its forecasts for year-end 2009 and 2010.
sentences.cn: 该公司也修改了2009年和2010年的年终预测。
